title: Ranked Delayed Lock in?
body:
Is anybody else getting this problem?
I tried to lock in but it didn't work, even if I spammed it.

replies.body: I've been getting these... Once in a queue I was messing with my friends jokingly as if i were to accidentally not lock in, i locked in with 3 seconds left and it didn't count it even though it did the lock in animation and sound. I dodged.
